name: Joaquín García
title: Senior Software Developer
summary: Highly adaptable and results-driven Senior Software Developer with over 8 years of experience in fast-paced, agile environments. Proven ability to deliver efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications through expertise in full-stack development, DevOps, and a commitment to continuous improvement. Specializing in Node.JS with Typescript and .Net with C#.

education.degree: High School Diploma with a Specialization in Physics and Mathematics
education.description: Graduated with honors. Minor in Physics and Mathematics.

achievements: Improved stability by migrating from a monolith to a microservices-based architecture orchestrated with Kubernetes, enabling faster iteration and deployment cycles.
Enhanced data security by implementing recommendations from an independent security audit.
Increased developer productivity by implementing CI/CD pipelines, significantly accelerating delivery of new features.
Improved availability and stability of in-platform video calls.
Developed an in-house, multi-user feature for live-annotating PDF documents during video calls, demonstrating rapid feature development.
Increased code quality and reliability by advocating for and implementing unit testing, fostering a culture of quality assurance.
Led efforts to establish and document best practices and code style guides for internal use, contributing to team efficiency and maintainability.
Conducted stress and load tests on the backend to ensure readiness for increased user demand, proactively identifying and addressing bottlenecks.
workExperience.description: Sole Backend Specialist in a dynamic, fast-paced team of 5, focusing on the development of AI-driven educational platforms. Consistently delivered high-quality solutions under challenging deadlines.

achievements: Provided first and second level support for international maritime customers, ensuring high-quality service and rapid issue resolution in a critical, real-time environment.
Maintained a high level of customer satisfaction by effectively communicating with customers and third-party vendors.
Provided support for Field Engineers, ensuring smooth operations and quick resolution of technical issues, often under time pressure.
Ensured high level of documentation and knowledge sharing, on a diverse technical stack, contributing to team efficiency and knowledge transfer in a fast-evolving domain.
workExperience.description: *Note: Also from 2016 to 2018 in Argentina. Technical support of maritime satellite communications systems. Real time troubleshooting of complex technical solutions in a fast paced environment.

achievements: Developed the feature 'Adaptive View' reducing development time for new features by eliminating the need to create new views for each feature.
workExperience.description: Assigned to customer Banco Galicia (https://www.bancogalicia.com.ar/), working on the e-bank portal for businesses.
Started as a Junior Mobile Developer and transitioned to a more senior, Full Stack position and customer Point of Contact.
achievements: Created Cross-Platform Mobile application for loyalty points tracking "Interpuntos" for customer Intermex (intermexonline.com).
Succesfully integrated with the client's backend based on SQL Server Stored Procedures and with their Auth Service based on IdentityServer 4.
Migrated the Frontend of the internal tool 'CheckDirect' (for the same custommer) from a Delphi-based Windows Application to an Angular-based Web Application.

workExperience.description: Power electronics design and Embedded Software development for LED lighting systems.
achievements: Designed and implemented a variety of digital and analog RGB light controllers for LED lights.
Created a robust communication protocol for synchronizing and addressing individual Lamps, supporting Wireless, Wired and Hybrid networks.
Implemented DMX512-compatible light controllers.
Developed GUIs for programming and live control of RGB lights.

professionalAttributes: Adaptability & Agility: Thrives in fast-paced, evolving environments, quickly adapting to new technologies and requirements.
Proactive Problem Solver: Identifies and addresses challenges independently, ensuring minimal disruption and continuous improvement.
Team Collaboration & Leadership: Actively contributes to team success, mentors colleagues, and takes initiative beyond defined roles to achieve shared goals.
High Availability & Commitment: Demonstrated willingness to go the extra mile to support team objectives and critical operations.
